016package io.micronaut.maven;
017
018import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.util.DefaultPrettyPrinter;
019import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
020import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectWriter;
021import org.apache.maven.model.Resource;
022import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
023import org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.Log;
024import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Mojo;
025import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Parameter;
026import org.apache.maven.plugins.resources.ResourcesMojo;
027
028import java.io.File;
029import java.io.IOException;
030import java.nio.file.Files;
031import java.nio.file.Path;
032import java.nio.file.Paths;
033import java.util.*;
034
035/**
036 * <p>Generate GraalVM <code>resources-config.json</code> with all the resources included in the application</p>
037 * <p><strong>WARNING</strong>: this goal is not intended to be executed directly.</p>
038 *
039 * @author Iván López
040 * @since 2.0
041 * @deprecated Please use native:generateResourceConfig and/or native:generateTestResourceConfig instead.
042 */
043@Mojo(name = GraalVMResourcesMojo.GRAALVM_RESOURCES)
044@Deprecated(since = "4.4.0", forRemoval = true)
045public class GraalVMResourcesMojo extends ResourcesMojo {
046
047    public static final String GRAALVM_RESOURCES = "graalvm-resources";
048
049    private static final String META_INF = "META-INF";
050    private static final String RESOURCES = "resources";
051    private static final String PATTERN = "pattern";
052    private static final String RESOURCE_CONFIG_JSON = "resource-config.json";
053    private static final List<String> EXCLUDED_META_INF_DIRECTORIES = Arrays.asList("native-image", "services");
054
055    private final ObjectWriter writer = new ObjectMapper().writer(new DefaultPrettyPrinter());
056
057    @Parameter(property = "micronaut.native-image.skip-resources", defaultValue = "false")
058    private Boolean nativeImageSkipResources;
059
060    @Override
061    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
062        if (Boolean.TRUE.equals(nativeImageSkipResources)) {
063            getLog().info("Skipping generation of resource-config.json");
064            return;
065        }
066
067        Set<String> resourcesToAdd = new HashSet<>();
068
069        // Application resources (src/main/resources)
070        for (Resource resource : getResources()) {
071            resourcesToAdd.addAll(findResourceFiles(Paths.get(resource.getDirectory()).toFile()));
072        }
073
074        // Generated resources (like openapi)
075        Path metaInfPath = getOutputDirectory().toPath().resolve(META_INF);
076        resourcesToAdd.addAll(findResourceFiles(metaInfPath.toFile(), Collections.singletonList(META_INF)));
077
078        Path nativeImagePath = buildNativeImagePath();
079        Path graalVMResourcesPath = metaInfPath.resolve(nativeImagePath).toAbsolutePath();
080
081        Map<String, Object> json = new HashMap<>();
082        List<Map<String, String>> resourceList = resourcesToAdd.stream()
083                .map(this::mapToGraalResource)
084                .toList();
085
086        json.put(RESOURCES, resourceList);
087
088        try {
089            Files.createDirectories(graalVMResourcesPath);
090            File resourceConfigFile = graalVMResourcesPath.resolve(RESOURCE_CONFIG_JSON).toFile();
091            getLog().info("Generating " + resourceConfigFile.getAbsolutePath());
092            writer.writeValue(resourceConfigFile, json);
093
094        } catch (IOException e) {
095            throw new MojoExecutionException("There was an error generating GraalVM resource-config.json file", e);
096        }
097    }
098
099    private Set<String> findResourceFiles(File folder) {
100        return this.findResourceFiles(folder, null);
101    }
102
103    private Set<String> findResourceFiles(File folder, List<String> filePath) {
104        Set<String> resourceFiles = new HashSet<>();
105
106        if (filePath == null) {
107            filePath = new ArrayList<>();
108        }
109
110        if (folder.exists()) {
111            File[] files = folder.listFiles();
112
113            if (files != null) {
114                boolean isMetaInfDirectory = folder.getName().equals(META_INF);
115
116                for (File element : files) {
117                    boolean isExcludedDirectory = EXCLUDED_META_INF_DIRECTORIES.contains(element.getName());
118                    // Exclude some directories in 'META-INF' like 'native-image' and 'services' but process other
119                    // 'META-INF' files and directories, for example, to include swagger-ui.
120                    if (!isMetaInfDirectory || !isExcludedDirectory) {
121                        if (element.isDirectory()) {
122                            List<String> paths = new ArrayList<>(filePath);
123                            paths.add(element.getName());
124
125                            resourceFiles.addAll(findResourceFiles(element, paths));
126                        } else {
127                            String joinedDirectories = String.join("/", filePath);
128                            String elementName = joinedDirectories.isEmpty() ? element.getName() : joinedDirectories + "/" + element.getName();
129
130                            resourceFiles.add(elementName);
131                        }
132                    }
133                }
134            }
135        }
136
137        return resourceFiles;
138    }
139
140    private Path buildNativeImagePath() {
141        String group = project.getGroupId();
142        String module = project.getArtifactId();
143
144        return Paths.get("native-image", group, module);
145    }
146
147    private Map<String, String> mapToGraalResource(String resourceName) {
148        Map<String, String> result = new HashMap<>();
149
150        if (resourceName.contains("*")) {
151            result.put(PATTERN, resourceName);
152        } else {
153            result.put(PATTERN, "\\Q" + resourceName + "\\E");
154        }
155
156        return result;
157    }
158
159    @Override
160    public void setLog(Log log) {
161        super.setLog(new JansiLog(log));
162    }
163}
